page.title: 04ECONOMICS
page.content: During the last 25 years Chesterfield has expanded its financial services. Banks include {BARCLAYS,CO-OPERATIVE, {LLOYDS,MIDLAND,NAT WEST,TSB,WILLIAMS {AND GLYNS,}and {YORKSHIRE,}with each bank having a cash point.The banks compete with building socs which now include {ABBEY NATIONAL,ALLIANCE,}the {ANGLIA,BRITANNIA,DERBYSHIRE,LEICESTER, {LEEDS,NATIONWIDE,}and {WOOLWICH.}There are 8 main or sub post offices.Banking hours are from 9-3o AM to 3-3o PM.from Monday to Friday,with several banks open an extra 2 hours Thurs or Friday. There are also 3 finance companies who advance loans to the public.Many of the schools in the area run banking accounts for pupils through the local {YORKSHIRE BANK,}minimum age being 7 years.Interest is accrued twice yearly like any normal bank deposit account.
